forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Drizzle then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle between 10pm and 4am, then a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. South southwest wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, a serene afternoon unfurls under a bright, sunlit sky, with temperatures hovering around a comfortable 62 degrees. The gentle west-southwest breeze is a welcome companion, caressing the cheeks of those wandering through the streets, as the vibrant cityscape breathes life into the day. The clarity is remarkable, with no sign of the notorious fog that often blankets the Bay, making the Golden Gate Bridge and the hills of Marin stand out in sharp relief against the blue. 

As twilight approaches, a more contemplative weather pattern emerges. The chance of drizzle becomes a gentle whisper on the wind, hinting at the possibility of rain later, with clouds preparing to encroach upon the tranquil blue. The evening promises a soothing indecisiveness with a low settling around 54 degrees, urging residents to bring a light jacket. For those seeking a simple pleasure, a stroll along the waterfront or an outdoor cafe will offer moments of reflection, while the nuances of autumn gather around; perhaps a visit to a local bookstore or an art gallery will provide shelter from the impending drizzle yet allow one to savor the city’s pulse. The day may close with the sweetness of a warm drink in hand, embracing the cozy embrace of the coming evening.
